titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 660) to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the safe storage of firearms, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 660) to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the safe storage of firearms, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Ms. DeLauro. Petition No: 118-7.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 660) to amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the safe storage of firearms.
